type.description:
## Moving

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/moving).

Checks whether the entity has moved this tick.

Type ID: `apugli:moving`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:moving"
}
```

title: Moving (Entity Condition Type) date: 2023-02-08

Moving
